featured.text: According to the passage, which of the following is a better choice for Halloween treats? (A) Chocolate.
Hard candies take a long time to consume and are also a bad choice for Halloween treats.

definition.zh_def: 萬聖節，慶祝於每年10月31日的節日，通常與鬼怪、南瓜燈和化妝派對有關。
definition.en_def: Halloween, a holiday celebrated on October 31st, associated with ghosts, pumpkins, and costumes.
definition.example: Children dress up in costumes and go trick-or-treating on Halloween.
